1600850.name: Guardian of Lore Soundtrack
1600850.description:
Guardian of Lore's official soundtrack. Composed by Ecuadorian game audio designer Carlos "Audiosource" Egas.

This beautifully crafted playlist of tunes inspired by the world of Guardian of Lore features autochthonous instruments mixed with orchestral sections and traditional music arrangements from each respective legend and their region where such was originated. Each unique composition was designed to reinforce the sense of worldbuilding the game creates.

Take in the sweet-sounding sounds of Quenas, Djembes, Palos de Agua, Udus, Charangos among other exotic instruments y might have never heard of before.

Be inspired by these tunes while you travel with our valiant prince as you save authentic Latin-American mythical stories.

Dare to face many dangers and become a true Guardian of Lore? Then you'll need a proper soundtrack to join you through your adventure!!
